instruction: Describe why reading a book is helpful.
output: Reading a book is an incredibly helpful activity to engage in. It can provide you with a wealth of knowledge and allow you to gain understanding in many different areas. Reading books can also be a great form of relaxation and can help to improve your focus and concentration. Furthermore, reading can help to reduce stress, improve your memory, provide insight into different cultures, and allow you to explore new worlds. In addition, reading can be a wonderful way to pass time and improve your language skills.
